entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
